title: Death toll from European floods passes 100 as receding waters reveal scope of devastation
content:
1. Death toll from European floods passes 100 as receding waters reveal scope of devastation  The Washington Post
  2. Germany mounts huge rescue effort after floods leave dozens dead and many more missing  CNN
  3. How have dozens died in flooding in Germany? - BBC News  BBC News
  4. At Least 40 Dead After Severe Flooding Sweeps Through Parts of Europe  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  5. Dozens killed in flooding caused by rainfall 'not seen in 100 years' in Europe  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
